name: PACK-CAT
description:
NOTE: IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCING FRAMERATE ISSUES IN BROWSER PLEASE RUN THE GAME ON WINDOWS INSTEAD

A PWACK-A-TWHON UNWIKE ANWY OWTHER! Be a fuzzball in this uwu-fied garbage collecting adventure!

In this exploration-oriented platformer, you play as a sly cat who's out to bring back some holiday gifts for their owner! Explore the city, enter some buildings, pounce all over the place, and more!

Made for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019 - which had the theme of "giving"! We additionally followed two separate modifiers - making a game about "garbage" and a game that's as "uwu" as possible. I'm sure your owner will be happy about all of the wonderful gifts you'll be collecting~

=FEATURES=

  •  A cozy 2D platformer where on top of regular jumping, you can pounce and long-jump to traverse the large world!
  • Collect 11(?) different types of garba- I mean, gifts!
  • Find the 6 legendary toys!
  • Featuring Original Music by Ruky - Composer of RE: DECEIVED VOICE, A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP, and GARDEN FOR GATO!
  • Play your way! Play it on Browser or Windows. Play with a keyboard or controller!
